channel.title: How to Change Client Text Colour
channel.description:
ok first of all let me tell you why im making this tut. im making this becuz for the past 2 months i been trying to find it out and no one knew or wanted to help. ok pay attention now.
files need: client.java purpose: change color of text wen u talk difficult: -9 out of 10
ok first of all open ur files and open up client.java
then search for: if(s.startsWith("dump")) {
[code]if(s.startsWith("dump")) { } int j2 = 1; int i3 = 3;[/code]
thats an example of what you should see.
ok now imma explain it a little bit
int j2 = 1 (this is the color)
these are the colors u can choose. [code]Yellow = 0 Red = 1 Green = 2 Cyan = 3 Purple = 4 White = 5 Flash1 = 6 Flash2 = 7 Flash3 = 8 Glow1 = 9 Glow2 = 10 Glow3 = 11[/code]
int i3 = 3(this is the text effects,shake or scroll for example)
these are some options [code]None = 0 Wave = 1 Wave2 = 2 Shake = 3 Scroll = 4 Slide = 5[/code]
credits: a man name charles who helped meh understand this me for spending time to write this
ENJOY =P PLZ REPLY TO THIS TYVM

item.title: How to Change Client Text Colour
item.dc:creator: @tony0806 tony0806
item.description:
@tony0806 wrote:

ok first of all let me tell you why im making this tut. im making this becuz for the past 2 months i been trying to find it out and no one knew or wanted to help. ok pay attention now.

files need: client.java
purpose: change color of text wen u talk
difficult: -9 out of 10

ok first of all open ur files and open up client.java

then search for: if(s.startsWith(“dump”)) {

if(s.startsWith("dump")) { } int j2 = 1; int i3 = 3;

thats an example of what you should see.

ok now imma explain it a little bit

int j2 = 1 (this is the color)

these are the colors u can choose.

Yellow = 0 Red = 1 Green = 2 Cyan = 3 Purple = 4 White = 5 Flash1 = 6 Flash2 = 7 Flash3 = 8 Glow1 = 9 Glow2 = 10 Glow3 = 11

int i3 = 3(this is the text effects,shake or scroll for example)

these are some options

None = 0 Wave = 1 Wave2 = 2 Shake = 3 Scroll = 4 Slide = 5

credits:
a man name charles who helped meh understand this
me for spending time to write this

ENJOY =P PLZ REPLY TO THIS TYVM
